q: Paula Abdul has done this before. She reigned for eight seasons on "American Idol" as the nice, if sometimes dizzy-seeming, judge who often clashed with bullyboy Simon Cowell . They were a potent, crowd-pleasing pair. I choose the word "kind' over` nice,' Paula Abdul says, recalling the bare-knuckle advice she got from dance great Gene Kelly : "Fail to prepare, and prepare to fail." So please don"t call her "nice." "Nice
